solution_line_template: The number of people in cars is {num_cars} * {people_per_car} = <<{num_cars}*{people_per_car}={people_in_cars}>>{people_in_cars}.
The number of people in taxis is {num_taxis} * {people_per_taxi} = <<{num_taxis}*{people_per_taxi}={people_in_taxis}>>{people_in_taxis}.
The number of people in vans is {num_vans} * {people_per_van} = <<{num_vans}*{people_per_van}={people_in_vans}>>{people_in_vans}.
In total {people_in_cars} + {people_in_taxis} + {people_in_vans} = <<{people_in_cars}+{people_in_taxis}+{people_in_vans}={total_people}>>{total_people} people went on the hike.
